title: Why this 'Purpose thing'?
description: "Having a purpose" seems to be a hype. Psychological and motivational theories and research indicate new generations "need a purpose" in order to be satisfied at work. Many companies try to define a purpose. What is all this hype about? What is some corporate nonsense and what is the purpose of having a purpose? ;) Let's dig a bit into the topic of purpose in life and organizations with some real life examples.
